com.mygdx.game.gameLogic.Characters

Interface CharacterInfo

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    EnemyInfo, HeroInfo
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Character, Enemy, EnemyFlying, EnemyGround, Hero, HeroLifesWrapper

    public interface CharacterInfo
    Provides an interface to query information about the character

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getXPos

        double getXPos()

      • getYPos

        double getYPos()

      • getXDim

        double getXDim()

      • getYDim

        double getYDim()

      • isFalling

        boolean isFalling()
        Returns:
        true if the character is moving downwards

      • isMovingY

        boolean isMovingY()
        Returns:
        true if character is moving along the y axis

      • isMovingX

        boolean isMovingX()
        Returns:
        true if character is moving along the x axis

      • getAnimationTime

        double getAnimationTime()
        Returns:
        a value from 0.0 to 1.0

      • getMovementDirectionX

        double getMovementDirectionX()
        Returns:
        double indicating which direction the character is moving. 0.0 for not moving, < 0.0 for moving left, > 0.0 for moving right

      • isMovingRight

        boolean isMovingRight()
        Returns:
        true if character is moving to the right or standing still (on X axis).

      • getYCenter

        double getYCenter()
        Returns:
        coordiante which corresponds to the Y of the center of the character

      • getXCenter

        double getXCenter()
        Returns:
        coordiante which corresponds to the X of the center of the character
